pages.text: 68|16|naneun geuui ko wie pyosileul saegil geos-ila

68|17|sillo naneun geudeul-eul siheomhayeoss-euni machi jeong-won-ui soyujadeul-eul siheomhan geosgwa gatnola : geudeul-eun, achim-eul maj-ihaess-eul ttae jeongnyeongko geugeos(yeolmae)eul ttal geos-ila maengsehadeola
68|18|geuleona geudeul-eun ye-oeleul duji anh-assnola
68|19|geulihayeo geudeul-i janeun sai geudae junim-eulobuteoui jaeang-i geugeos(jeong-won)eul maemdol-assnola
68|20|geulihayeo geugeos(jeong-won)eun chilheug-ui bamgwa gat-i doeeossnola
68|21|geuleohge geudeul-eun achim-eul maj-ihaess-eul ttae seologa seololeul buleudeola
68|22|‘geudaedeul-i (yeolmaeleul) ttalyeo handamyeon geudaedeul-ui gyeongjagjilo achim iljjig tteonasio’
68|23|geulihayeo geudeul-eun bimilseule iyagihamyeo chulbalhayeossnola
68|24|‘oneul-eun eotteon bul-uhan jado geudaedeul-ege deul-eoomyeon jeoldaelo an doeo’
68|25|geudeul-eun jeojie gwanhan gud-eun gyeolsim-eul jinin chae achim iljjig tteonassnola
68|26|geulihayeo geudeul-i geugeos(jeong-won)eul boass-eul ttae malhagil “jinsillo ulineun gil-eul jalmos deul-eossnola”
68|27|“geuleohji anhnola. ulineun jeji bad-eun jadeul-ila”
68|28|geudeul jung-ui gajang baleun jaga malhagil “naega geudaedeul-ege (hananim-eul) chan-yanghaeya handago malhaji anh-assneunga?”
68|29|geudeul-i malhagil “jeohuiui junim-eun wanbyeoghasin bun-imyeo sillo jeohuineun budanghan jadeul-ieossseubnida”
68|30|geudeul-eun seologa seololeul balabomyeo sangdaeleul wonmanghadeola
68|31|geudeul-i malhagil “jaeang-idoda! sillo ulineun gyeong-gyeleul neom-eoseon jadeul-ieossseubnida”
68|32|“uliui junimkkeseo uliege geuboda deo joh-eun geos-eulo daechehae jusigil balabnida. sillo ulineun uliui junimkke somanghal ppun-ibnida”
68|33|beol-ilan jeoleohadoda. geuleona geudeul-i algo issdamyeon sillo naese-ui beol-eun deo keunola
68|34|sillo hananim-eul gyeong-oehaneun jadeul-eun geudeul junimkke gakkaun gos-eseo gippeum-ui cheongug-eul gajil geos-ila
68|35|geuleondedo naega, sunjonghaneun jadeul-eul aghaeng-eul jeojileuneun jadeulgwa gat-i dundan mal-inga
68|36|geudaedeul-ege museun il-i il-eonan geos-inga? geudaedeul-eun eotteohge pangyeolhaneun geos-inga
68|37|animyeon geugeos(pangyeol)eul wihayeo geudaedeul-i ilgneun chaeg-ilado issdan mal-inga
68|38|sillo geudaedeul-eun goleuneun daelo gajil geos-ilaneun mal-i geu(chaeg) an-e issneun geos-inga
68|39|animyeon geudaedeul-i buhwal-ui nalkkaji jisogdoeneun, naega chaeg-imjil maengseleul gajigo iss-eo sillo geudaedeul-eun pangyeolhaneun daelo gajindan mal-inga
68|40|geudae(muhammadeu)neun geudeul-ege geudeul jung-ui nuga geugeos-eul bojeunghal geos-inji mul-eobola

68|41|animyeon geudeul-ege (hananimgwa) daedeunghan jonjaedeul-i issdan mal-inga? geuleohdamyeon, geudeul-i jinsildoen jadeul-ilamyeon geudeul-i malhaneun daedeunghan jonjaedeul-eul gajyeowa bodolog hala
68|42|geunal jeong-gang-iga nochuldoego geudeul-eun buboghal geos-eul yogubad-euna (geuleohge) hajileul moshadeola
